definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]

sentences.english: Two hundred years ago, Ascension Island was a barren volcanic edifice.
sentences.chinese: 兩百年前，阿森松島是一個貧瘠的火山結構殘跡。

sentences.english: Ascension was discovered by the Portuguese in 1501.
sentences.chinese: 阿森松島是葡萄牙人於1501年出現的。

sentences.english: Ascension was a strategic base for the Royal Navy.
sentences.chinese: 阿森松島是皇家海軍的戰略基地。
